# ITE Trip Generation Reference {#sec-apdx-tripgen}

This appendix contains the ITE Trip Generation Manual references used for trip generation, including to determine the appropriate study level for this TIA. These are land use codes 710 (General Office Building), 816 (Hardware/Paint Store), and 932 (High-Turnover (Sit-Down) Restaurant), for both the daily trips and the PM peak trips.
